sourcesContent:
import React, { FC, useState } from 'react'
import { Route, Router, Switch } from 'react-router-dom'

import styles from './App.module.css'

import { Nav } from './components/Nav/Nav'
import { Profile } from './components/Profile/Profile'
import { ProfileNav } from './components/ProfileNav/ProfileNav'
import { News } from './components/News/News'
import { Sidebar } from './components/Sidebar/Sidebar'
import { TweetsAndRepliesTest } from './components/ProfileNav/componentsTest/TweetsAndRepliesTest'
import { LikesTest } from './components/ProfileNav/componentsTest/LikesTest'
import { MediaTest } from './components/ProfileNav/componentsTest/MediaTest'

import { createBrowserHistory } from 'history'
const browserHistory = createBrowserHistory()

export const App: FC = () => {
  const [postNews, SetPostNews] = useState([])
  const [flagLike, setFlag] = useState(false)

  const setFlagLike = () => {
    setFlag((prev) => !prev)
  }

  return (
    <>
      <Router history={browserHistory}>
        <main className={styles.main}>
          <Nav SetPostNews={SetPostNews} flagLike={flagLike} />
          <section className={styles.list}>
            <Profile />
            <ProfileNav />
            <Switch>
              <Route
                path="/"
                component={() => (
                  <News postNews={postNews} setFlagLike={setFlagLike} flagLike={flagLike} />
                )}
                exact
              />
              <Route
                path="/Profile"
                component={() => (
                  <News postNews={postNews} setFlagLike={setFlagLike} flagLike={flagLike} />
                )}
              />
              <Route
                path="/popup"
                component={() => (
                  <News postNews={postNews} setFlagLike={setFlagLike} flagLike={flagLike} />
                )}
              />
              <Route
                path="/Tweets"
                component={() => (
                  <News postNews={postNews} setFlagLike={setFlagLike} flagLike={flagLike} />
                )}
              />
              <Route path="/Tweets and replies" component={TweetsAndRepliesTest} />
              <Route path="/Likes" component={LikesTest} />
              <Route path="/Media" component={MediaTest} />
            </Switch>
          </section>
          <Sidebar />
        </main>
      </Router>
    </>
  )
}
